/>
Introduction
This topic contains guidance on handling decisions for increased evaluation and/or secondary SC with a co-existing severance determination, such as handling
increase and secondary claims for conditions found to require severance
, and
increases in compensation in cases involving severance of SC
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section B - Severance of Service Connection (SC)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section B
